text.config.simple-item-magnet.option.ma:
How Distance is calculated.

Euclidean Distance: finds the shortest path between item and player by drawing a straight line in space.

Cardinal Distance: looks at how much the positions differ in each direction (x/y/z), and uses the biggest difference as the distance.
Specifies maximum distance items can be pulled from.
text.config.simple-item-magnet.title: Magnet settings
